replies.msg: Cloudflare, Inc. is an American web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.[2] Cloudflare's services sit between a website's visitor and the Cloudflare user's hosting provider, acting as a reverse proxy for websites. Cloudflare's headquarters are in San Francisco, California, with additional offices in Lisbon, London, Singapore, Munich, San Jose, Champaign, Illinois, Austin, New York City and Washington, D.C.

replies.msg: 唔好用IT 角度去出發，生意角度，一單marketing campaign 由brief 到wireframe 到design 到寫code ＋ 開會講價 + quotation，total 有機會得兩星期就要交第一round demo，任你幾powerful都好，CloudFlare 去deploy 係 low cost 同快，mark up 都夠profit margin 去bundle service，就算你話你一晚起到server + deploy 到aws shield, 唔好意思，冇咁多時間，你唔會有多過1hr 去攪，轉頂又要交demo，手上D客又追貨，現實就係咁，點做？

要睇下你銀碼幾多

Eg

我睇好佢一個月後會大過$35
你可以用黎賺期權金 i.e $2.4*100=$240
回報率=240/(35.4*100)=6.77%
